edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Actor
      • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_2.actors.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActiveAgents

    public class Player
extends Actor
implements ActiveAgents
    This class represents the user controlled Actor who's data is manipulated through the game's logic. In addition to all methods and fields of its super class, it also contains additional methods relating to schemes of user control.
